plot: When one man (Graf) terrorizes a town and its citizens, they join together to take 'care' of him. A special prosecutor (Bruce Boxleitner) is brought in to find the guilty person.
title: The Town Bully
plot_es: When one man (Graf) terrorizes a town and its citizens, they join together to take 'care' of him. A special prosecutor (Bruce Boxleitner) is brought in to find the guilty person.
plot_en: When one man (Graf) terrorizes a town and its citizens, they join together to take 'care' of him. A special prosecutor (Bruce Boxleitner) is brought in to find the guilty person.
